Reviews.Title: Nice phone
Reviews.Author: Dire_Wolf
Reviews.Content: Be aware that this phone was never meant to be sold in the USA and does not have any type of warranty coverage on it through Nokia.  The phone comes with Spanish and English instruction manuals. The phone is set to display the English language out of the box. The phones charger is for a different receptacle type but comes with an adapter so that you can use the charger in an US standard electrical receptacle.  Nice phone, I found the reviews for it online to be accurate.

Reviews.Title: A good basic phone
Reviews.Author: run
Reviews.Content: I wanted a phone not too complicated and a good phone to make phone call, not to play or go on internet. This phone is good, I need to plug it just once a week to refill the battery, I don't use it too much. The only bad part is that it comes from somewhere in Asia, so the only language i'm able to understand is english. I'm french, so sometimes I need to text in french, and that's really boring.

Reviews.Title: exelente
Reviews.Author: franklin
Reviews.Content: soy de venezuela exelente compra muy buen producto y atiempo no tube ningun percanse me llego en buen estado y es nuevo

Reviews.Title: Cellphone Nokia X2
Reviews.Author: Renuka Sathyamurthy "ST"
Reviews.Content: Nice Slick and small with most options.  Like it,  Has fm radio, camera, 5 MP camera, push email and good to use worldwide

Reviews.Title: Request configuration message to activate MMS, use CleverTexting for non-Latin input characters
Reviews.Author: Sasha
Reviews.Content: "Writing [input] Languages" for my X2-00 for sending text messages in characters other than Latin I purchased for a small fee from Nokia online store as "CleverTexting" products.For Multimedia Messaging Service (MMS) to function properly with AT&T; Wireless, I asked to send me a "configuration message" with configuration settings, per suggestion in the user manual ( http://nds1.nokia.com/files/support/apac/phones/guides/Nokia_X2-00_UG_en.pdf ) to "contact your service provider" from whom "you may receive the configuration settings... as a configuration message".Some support information in English (including the above-mentioned link to the PDF user manual in English) I found on Nokia's India support webpage at: http://www.nokia.com/in-en/support/product/nokia-x2-00/ to which I turned as my phone was assembled in India.

Reviews.Title: super Phone
Reviews.Author: Linda Lopez
Reviews.Content: Great Phone, it s my second Nokia X2 and I would buy it again a 3 rd time :) really happy with it !

Reviews.Title: Genuine Nokia Phone is good, watch out for fake ones
Reviews.Author: Brian of Niagara Falls
Reviews.Content: I got a fake phone and told the seller to switch suppliers. I will give them the benefit of the doubt that they unknowingly were selling fake Nokia X2's. I bought a real one from another website. In the meantime, the seller was very courteous and ensured I got a full refund on the shipping AND the return shipping!The speaker was damaged (creating a crackling), one speaker didn't work at all (stereo speakers were advertised), the package included a tacky shiny "original" sticker, the OVI cd was missing, the packaging box looked like it was printed on an inkjet printer with ink smears, the booklet was made of low quality paper and missing the sleek acrylic paper used for the cover page, the package had been opened, the phone's outer body has a cheap feel to it, and I could separate the screen from the phone's housing with my fingernail.Don't get me wrong, the electronics and software inside the phone seemed to be authentic. The operation of the phone was speedy. Everything else seemed fake. If you like a well-constructed phone with good speakers, then look elsewhere.I compared it to an authentic Nokia X2 and the difference was night and day. The real one I found to be only $91 USD elsewhere (2013, May), it took 1 month to arrive in Canada, but it was worth it, and I got it shipped free. I got a true comparison of what a real genuine Nokia X2 is supposed to feel and sound like. This phone is loud and the quality of the music is great after you set the equalizer to tone down on the treble. The construction of the genuine phone is solid and I cannot separate the LCD screen from the phone's housing.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Pedro Celis
Reviews.Content: Very good phone, excellent camera takes very good pictures, is compact, was sent on time, I recommend it 100%. 5 of 5

Reviews.Title: EXCELENTE

Reviews.Content: TODO MUY BIEN 100% RECOMENDADO PUEDEN COMPRAR CON TODA CONFIANZA TODO A LLEGADO DE LA MANERA CORRECTA LO MEJOR, LO MEJOR

Reviews.Title: genial!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: jean
Reviews.Content: llego como lo anuncia el vendedor!! nuevo de paquete a un precio justo! funciona en 3G en mi pais!! lo recomiendo 100%

Reviews.Title: Polish menu
Reviews.Author: Curly
Reviews.Content: Menu was set up on Polish, there are icons witch stay with Polish words even if you change the language to English.

Reviews.Title: Did not receive the item as shown
Reviews.Author: Psycheplay
Reviews.Content: I don't really have a problem with the product, yet, as I was sent the nokia x2-01 which looks like a blackberry and nothing like the sleek simple phone I thought I had ordered.  5 stars for the shipment delivery, very quick!

Reviews.Title: Good choice
Reviews.Author: Yonathan Mendez "YonathaN95"
Reviews.Content: Excellent phone. It comes with all I need to communicate with my friends and family. Good camera and nice perfomance.

Reviews.Title: really bad
Reviews.Author: Chem
Reviews.Content: It has some defects. First, its camera is miserable. Second, it doesn't have an English Manuel. Last, poor materials.These are my opinions.

Reviews.Title: Nice phone with light weight and good display features
Reviews.Author: vijay sankari "VJ"
Reviews.Content: Nokia X2 is really a nice phone with light weight and good display features...working with all GSM carriers like  AT T and T mobile....

2.2" Display 240 x 320 pixels, 5 Megapixel Camera, Candy Bar Form, Bluetooth v2.1 / A2DP
